listData.name: Investment Fixed Rate Loan
listData.description: Fixed Rate Loan for 1 year

features.additionalValue: SMS/Email Alerts - Set up SMS or email alerts for credits, debits, logins to your account and more

features.additionalInfo: Additional repayments allowed during the fixed term up to $10,000. Early payout incurs break costs.
Automatic Repayments can be set up from salary, LCU account, or external account
Flexible repayments. Weekly, fortnightly or monthly
Split Loans. Have the flexibility to split your loan between fixed and variable products
Interest calculated daily and applied monthly
No ongoing Fees. No annual, monthly or weekly fees
Repayment type Principal and Interest
Application fee of $200 payable on funding of your loan

eligibility.additionalValue: At least one borrower must be an Australian resident.
Income required to service loan. Applicant must meet LCU lending criteria

eligibility.additionalInfo: Security on Australian Residential Property (1st mortgage)
Maximum borrowing capacity (LVR) is 80% of valuation, 70% for land or rural properties, with no LMI or 95% with LMI
Minimum loan term is 1 year
Maximum loan term. Loan will be renegotiated at the end of the term - max 30 years.

Must be a shareholder owning a $10 share.  Each shareholder holds an equal share regardless of their balance. Shareholders have a say in how we are run. "Own your Bank". $10 share is refunded if you choose to close your account.

listData.description: Get a monthly income on your investment

features.additionalInfo: The minimum term available for this product is 12 months
Scaled panalty applies, see linked URI

Under the FCS certain deposits are protected up to a limit of $250,000 for each account holder at any bank, building society, credit union or other authorised deposit-taking institution (ADI) that is incorporated in Australia and authorised by the Australian Prudential Regulation Authority (APRA).

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum amount to open a Fixed Term Deposit is $1,000
Any deposits above this are at the Credit Union's discretion

eligibility.additionalValue: If not an Australian resident, you must complete a Tax Residency Declaration

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be a shareholder owning a $10 share.  Each shareholder holds an equal share regardless of their balance. Shareholders have a say in how we are run. "Own your Bank". $10 share is refunded if you choose to close your account.

To be eligible to join you must be at least 8 years of age and referred by a family member or friend who already has an account with LCU. Alternatively you may be eligible to join if you: work or live in the greater Ryde area; have an association with Riverside Corporate or Macquarie Park; or work in a STEM industry.

features.additionalValue: Visa Debit Card with payWave
Use your compatible Apple device to make payments
Use your compatible Android device to make payments
Pay bills from this account
SMS/Email Alerts - Set up SMS or email alerts for credits, debits, logins to your account and more

features.additionalInfo: Sub accounts - For budgeting purposes, separate your funds into multiple accounts
BPAYView - Receive your bills directly to your internet banking and pay with one click
Sweep Facility - Automatically move funds between your accounts based on a minimum or maximum balance to be maintained on the specified account

Government Guarantee - Under the FCS certain deposits are protected up to a limit of $250,000 for each account holder at any bank, building society, credit union or other authorised deposit-taking institution (ADI) that is incorporated in Australia and authorised by the Australian Prudential Regulation Authority (APRA).
Receive international payment to your account through Western Union. No fee for sender or receiver.
Send International Payments self serve through your internet banking or staff assisted
International exchange on foreign cheques and cash
International purchase foreign draft
International purchase foreign cash
International Prepaid MasterCard Cash Passport
Overdrawn accounts (with a balance below $0.00) will be charged the current lending rate applicable to the account. See Lending Rates above.
Free LCU counter cheque - order a counter cheque online or in person at no cost.
Direct Debit facility available - allow a third party to transfer money from your account, typically to pay bills eg. Phone, energy, gym
Direct Credit facility available - automatically credit your LCU account with funds from another bank account
Card control - Lock and unlock your Visa card with the LCU - Banking App
Periodic Payments - Schedule one off or re-occuring payments from your account
Direct credit allocation - Split your payroll or other regular payments received to your account to different sub accounts.

eligibility.additionalValue: If not an Australian resident, you must complete a Tax Residency Declaration

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be a shareholder owning a $10 share.  Each shareholder holds an equal share regardless of their balance. Shareholders have a say in how we are run. "Own your Bank". $10 share is refunded if you choose to close your account.

To be eligible to join you must be at least 8 years of age and referred by a family member or friend who already has an account with LCU. Alternatively you may be eligible to join if you: work or live in the greater Ryde area; have an association with Riverside Corporate or Macquarie Park; or work in a STEM industry.

features.additionalInfo: Sub accounts - For budgeting purposes, separate your funds into multiple accounts
BPAYView - Receive your bills directly to your internet banking and pay with one click
Sweep Facility - Automatically move funds between your accounts based on a minimum or maximum balance to be maintained on the specified account

Government Guarantee - Under the FCS certain deposits are protected up to a limit of $250,000 for each account holder at any bank, building society, credit union or other authorised deposit-taking institution (ADI) that is incorporated in Australia and authorised by the Australian Prudential Regulation Authority (APRA).

Overdrawn accounts (with a balance below $0.00) will be charged the current lending rate applicable to the account. See Lending Rates above.
Free LCU counter cheque - order a counter cheque online or in person at no cost.
Direct Debit facility available - allow a third party to transfer money from your account, typically to pay bills eg. Phone, energy, gym
Direct Credit facility available - automatically credit your LCU account with funds from another bank account
Card control - Lock and unlock your Visa card with the LCU - Banking App
Periodic Payments - Schedule one off or re-occuring payments from your account
Direct credit allocation - Split your payroll or other regular payments received to your account to different sub accounts.
